## LoadingProgressIndicatorProps.tickDurationFirst property

Duration of first tick in ms (default: 300).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
tickDurationFirst?: number;
```

## Remarks

It may be preferable to make the first tick shorter to give the user quicker feedback when they click a link.
